backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing user profile management and appointment request submission with access control checks and validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping ministry seals features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Compiled list of concise summaries for all major frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell loading the React app via root div and main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all site pages and provides the router to the app.
frontend/src/components/BrandSections.ts: Provides styled ScriptureBlock and EventHighlight components for branded content sections.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipAvaila: Static availability calendar with legend and explanatory text for leadership scheduling.
frontend/src/components/MinistrySealsSec: Displays ministry seals in a responsive grid with dialog popups for full-size image viewing.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Reusable page section wrapper with configurable background, padding, and ID.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryCtas.tsx: Primary CTA component rendering visit, watch live, and scheduling links in multiple layout variants.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with about text, navigation links, contact link, and a bottom copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main page layout with navigation, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive site navigation bar with logo, links, CTAs, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Typography.tsx: Provides styled typography components for titles, subtitles, and body text.
frontend/src/content/ministrySeals.ts: Exports an array of ministry seal and event image metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for submitting appointments, retrieving requests, and managing user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color tokens, themes, and component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Renders the Connect page with service times, location details, live stream info, and social media sections, including hash-based scroll behavior.
frontend/src/pages/GatheringAt6Page.tsx: Displays information about The Gathering at 6 event, including schedule, location, and what attendees can expect.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero banner, welcome message, core values, and links to key areas of the site.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipGovernanceP: Shows leadership and governance details, including the presiding prelate, availability calendar, and organizational structure.
frontend/src/pages/MinistriesPage.tsx: Outlines the church’s ministries, ministry seals, and ways for members to get involved.
frontend/src/pages/OurMissionPage.tsx: Presents the church’s mission, core focus areas (Connect, Empower, Extend), and overall commitments.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachPage.tsx: Renders the Outreach page with sections describing community service efforts and highlights key outreach programs.
frontend/src/pages/ScheduleMeetingPage.t: Implements a detailed appointment request form with authentication checks, date/time handling, and submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/VisitPage.tsx: Displays visitor information with sections describing what to expect and links to additional resources.
frontend/src/pages/WhoWeArePage.tsx: Shows information about the organization’s mission, beliefs, and purpose across structured sections.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Provides a helper to build encoded public asset URLs under the /assets path.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, layout, and animations with custom theme values.
project_state.json: Defines project state for building a Wix-based church website, including brand palette, required pages, features, governance content, and known issues. Flags appointment scheduling as a request workflow and notes missing ministry seal images as a fix request.
